trans-unit.target: TEXT_WARPINNOLDSHARLAYAN_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_000<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Ready for a nap?
TEXT_WARPINNOLDSHARLAYAN_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_150<tab>Clean sheets and warm blankets await. Rest as long as you like!
TEXT_WARPINNOLDSHARLAYAN_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_200<tab>As G'raha explained, the andron's rooms were furnished for folks needing a break from all-night research or recently returned from expeditions.

TEXT_WARPINNOLDSHARLAYAN_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_201<tab>The Students are used to seeing those walls plastered with articles and diagrams and personal messages, but I imagine it's quite a surprise for our newer guests...
TEXT_WARPINNOLDSHARLAYAN_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_202<tab>Why not take them down, you ask? Well, it's often the same people who stay in these chambers, after all.
TEXT_WARPINNOLDSHARLAYAN_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_203<tab>And besides, when I see old notes written by friends who've since passed, it's... Well, it's comforting, in a way─as if they're still here with us.

TEXT_WARPINNOLDSHARLAYAN_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_204<tab>Oh, and just to be clear: these are properly appointed bedrooms. Any mention of “naps” is not meant to dissuade you from getting a full night's sleep!
